extended_input_schema.label: Business process parameters
extended_input_schema.hint: Container for the processing options for a business process. If no options are submitted (or the options are submitted as 'false') then the business process is simply initiated as if it where submitted on-line with approvals, reviews, notifications and to-do's in place. If the Initiator is an Integration System User, any validations you configured on the Initiation step are ignored.

input.text: Failure trying to add Pluralsight course `#{_('data.workato_service.a25ad783.request.title')}` (Row #{_('data.workato_service.a25ad783.request.row_number')}) due to the following error: ```#{_('data.catch.68ef2323.message')}```

block.comment: Do not post to slack if the error message is "Course Title must be unique". For some reason, workato can not match this exact phrase so I had to search for phrases that include "course title" and "unique".
